channel.title: Bookish on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Bookish on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Mark Gatiss on His New Series ‘Bookish,’ the ‘Romance of Crime’ and Not Having to Worry About Spoiling ‘Fantastic Four’
item.description: With his new show “Bookish,” Mark Gatiss hasn’t tired of coming up with ways to kill people. “Sherlock Holmes himself said, ‘There’s nothing new under the sun,’” says the Emmy-winning co-creator/star
